verbs.description: record rainfall causes flooding across south texas as of 7 a m thursday morning corpus christi [V: had] received in just three days almost triple the rainfall it normally gets for the entire month of june according to the national weather service matthew brady waylon collins mexico texas coast nws rio grande valley south texas naval air station corpus christi brownsville texas mcallen texas
